```{r homework review}
mtcars2 <- mtcars[order(mtcars$mpg, decreasing=TRUE),]

#this is bad
mtcars2 <- mtcars[order(-mtcars$mpg),]
#why it's bad 

test <- matrix(runif(100, -50, 50), ncol=5)
test2 <- test[order(-test[,1]),]

test2

mtcars2 <- mtcars[rev(order(mtcars$mpg)),]
#how to order character from higher to lower - just order() but defaults to alphabetical 

mtcars2

#avoid periods in variable names, no spaces in file names
#keep variables distinct 


#this will give the individual values by order
sort(mtcars$mpg)
mtcars$mpg[order(mtcars$mpg)]
```
